rooms.description: Entrance Hall, Vastu-compliant positioning aligning with the northeast direction for positive energy.
Modern living space adjacent to open terrace, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu principles.
Compact, functional kitchen with modern fixtures placed per Vastu guidelines (west or northwest corner) for harmonious energy flow.
Integrated dining area near the living room and kitchen to enhance family connectivity.
Designated outdoor swimming pool space with safety features, placed on the south-west boundary as per Vastu considerations for water-related elements.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing north-east to welcome positive energy and light.
Large windows in living room for natural lighting and ventilation.
Properly placed kitchen windows ensuring light while minimizing drafts per Vastu guidelines.
Garage door integrated on the north side to align with Vastu for stability and security.
